info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 27 at 4:13PM EST until December 28 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Litchfield County in Northwestern Connecticut, The Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, Greater Capital Region including the Helderbergs, Eastern Catskills, Mid Hudson Valley, and the Taconics of eastern New York and the Berkshires of western Massachusetts. * WHEN...Until 7 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions and walking surfaces due to a light accumulation of snow and ice. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
